name: Spider's Web
description:
A short RPG horror game about a girl who tries to untangle a tight knot in her life.

•About 1-3 hrs of gameplay 

•Only runs on Windows 

•There are 6 endings

Link to a guide to all endings below:

 https://spiderswebrpg.tumblr.com/post/625299050787438592/spiders-web-ending-guide

Thank you for playing!
